message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it offers exceptional value, even at that price.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is way too high for me. I'm looking to spend closer to $10,000. Would you be willing to come down on the price?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  While I understand your perspective, $10,000 is significantly less than what I can accept.  Could you do $17,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. However, $17,000 is still more than I'm comfortable spending.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,500?
